subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The cyclist Lance Armstrong recently began proceedings for reinstatement to the U.S. Anti-Doping Agency’s out-of-competition testing pool, a move which may suggest a return to competition.
snippet: The cyclist Lance Armstrong recently began proceedings for reinstatement to the U.S. Anti-Doping Agency’s out-of-competition testing pool, a move which may suggest a return to competition.
